Documentation framework created successfully. Created three comprehensive planning documents: 1) implementation-roadmap.md - 14-week phased development plan with milestones, risk assessment, and team structure. 2) README.md - Central hub for all planning documentation with quick start guide and key decisions. 3) development-guidelines.md - Detailed coding standards, Git workflow, code review process, and TDD practices. All documents are based on native Swift development with Apple Intelligence features for voice-driven house consciousness interaction. Note: No other agent plans were found in Memory at time of documentation creation.
